column4: I set Ubuntu up to automatically connect to my wifi network on start, and it does. My problem is that the DNS doesn't work until I manually do iwconfig wlan1 essid Main key off && dhclient wlan1. This started when I set up WPA using wpa_supplicant. Can anybody help?
mabye put these commands in yours auto-run directory?
But that's cheating. I want to fix the problem the proper way
